about_the_game:
🔍 Welcome to "Top Web Search 23" – The Ultimate Search Showdown! 🔍

Top Web Search 23 is a unique quiz-style game, blending elements of strategy and knowledge testing, without being confined to a specific genre label.

Embark on an epic quest to conquer the web as you face off against intriguing pairs of options. The rules are simple: guess which option gets more web searches, and earn +1 point for every correct choice. But be careful – a wrong decision sends you back to square one.

🌐 Explore 500+ Captivating Search Scenarios! 🌐

Dive into the digital frontier with over 500 captivating search scenarios. Will you opt for the iconic London Eye or the global concern of climate change? How about choosing between Tokyo and Oslo?

Features:
- 🌐 Explore 500+ captivating search scenarios across diverse categories.
- 🚀 Immerse yourself in interactive gameplay, predicting web search trends.
- 🌍 Gain educational insights into renowned brands, figures, and trending topics.
- 🎵 Musical Adventure: Enhance your gaming experience with a diverse soundtrack, featuring a myriad of tunes to accompany your web search journey.

Embark on an enthralling journey through a vast spectrum of categories, including renowned brands, influential companies, music, actors, AGD, RTV, and everyday queries like "shops near me" or "Italian Restaurant." Explore diverse landscapes, encountering historical figures, countries, and much more. Each decision you make unravels a unique adventure in the expansive and diverse world of "Top Web Search 23".

legal_notice: Words used in this game adhere to the fair use doctrine.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: integrated graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

name: Top Web Search 23

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs 2gb+ VRAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPUs 2gb+ VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
